ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] greetings and a ?
ygData.msgSnippet: The Forge in Felwith is a Cultural Forge it can only be used with the High Elf Reciepes, you have to use the forge in kelethin to do normal smithing - i dont
ygData.messageBody:
The Forge in Felwith is a "Cultural Forge" it can only be used with the High Elf Reciepes, you have to use the forge in kelethin to do normal smithing - i dont know if theres a normal forge in felwith i have never found one.

 

There is a hidden forge in Felwithe.. and darn if I can remember the instructions for finding it now! I've been looking for an hour for where I read that, but no luck yet.  :-(  You literally have to look straight up -- and I want to say it involves being a few steps away from the bank. If I can find the directions, I will post them right away!

 

~Kyndara Silverleaf~
Ranger in her 35th season of service to Karana,
Firiona Vie
<Ring of the Light>
